text: One Night of Love is a 1934 American romantic musical movie directed by Victor Schertzinger and was adapted from the novel Don't Fall in Love. It stars Grace Moore, Lyle Talbot, Tullio Carminati, Mona Barrie, Jessie Ralph and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1935. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1934 romance movies Category:1934 musical movies Category:American romance movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Victor Schertzinger
title: One Night of Love
